perturbation.original_text:
Products' (hereinafter defined); and

      WHEREAS, Manning has granted such rights to Pey Dirt together with the right to sublicense such rights.
perturbation.changed_text:
Products' (hereinafter defined as cold breakfast cereals); and

      WHEREAS, Manning has granted such rights to Pey Dirt together with the right to sublicense such rights.
perturbation.explanation: The original text refers to 'Products' as hereinafter defined, but the term is actually defined later in Section 1(g). This change explicitly defines it early, creating a potential conflict if the later definition differs.

perturbation.changed_text: (g)   "Products" shall mean a range of food items including, but not limited to, cold breakfast cereals, snacks, and beverages.
perturbation.explanation: This modification broadens the definition of 'Products' to include more than just cold breakfast cereals, directly contradicting the initial definition provided in the preamble. This inconsistency creates uncertainty about the scope of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: 12.   Default. (a) If either party at any time during the Contract Period shall (i) fail to make any payment of any sum of money herein specified to be made, or (ii) fail to observe or perform any of the covenants, agreements or obligations hereunder (other than the payment of money), the non-defaulting party may terminate this Agreement as follows: as to subparagraph (i) if such payment is not made within ten (10) days after the defaulting party shall have received written notice of such failure to make payment, or as to subparagraph (ii) if such default is not cured within thirty (30) days after the defaulting party shall have received written notice specifying in reasonable detail the nature of such default.
perturbation.changed_text: 12.   Default. (a) If either party at any time during the Contract Period shall (i) fail to make any payment of any sum of money herein specified to be made, or (ii) fail to observe or perform any of the covenants, agreements or obligations hereunder (other than the payment of money), the non-defaulting party may terminate this Agreement as follows: as to subparagraph (i) if such payment is not made within ten (10) days after the defaulting party shall have received written notice of such failure to make payment, or as to subparagraph (ii) if such default is not cured within fifteen (15) days after the defaulting party shall have received written notice specifying in reasonable detail the nature of such default.
perturbation.explanation: Here, the cure period for non-monetary defaults (subsection (ii)) is changed from thirty (30) to fifteen (15) days. This creates a clear contradiction within the agreement regarding the time allowed to correct a non-monetary breach, leading to potential disputes over timelines and termination rights.
